vote.title: Authorize an optional child-care facilities exemption of 50 percent for qualifying child-care facilities as defined in the Texas Tax Code beginning with the 2024 tax year (fiscal year beginning October 1, 2024) - Estimated Annual Revenue Foregone: TBD General Fund ($79,512) and Debt Service Fund ($30,507) totaling ($110,019)
